text: Zisas mba ana phorga ruigi guma, ana guigira wo ndavar ana nɨɨŋgi, ana khaŋ Pita ga nzuai, “Mbure, Guma Bakɨmera mbure.” Saimon Pita wo ruga hav shari shaage zorgiap kav ŋgarav ki, ana kav khueŋ mbararagiap, “Mbure, Guma Bakɨmera mbure,” ana nera mbararagiap, wo ruga hav shari shaage kegap, fega mbɨn mbarav, dia thɨvar vui.
